description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bk68f","text":"This protocol details the bulk water enrichment for the isolation of Salmonella from surface water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":69,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"4dtjs","text":"Supplies Needed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gdsc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bp4uv","text":"Sterilized 2 L bottles","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bekto","text":"Sterilized 500 mL and 1L graduated cylinders","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1so4","text":"5x Universal Pre-Enrichment broth (UPB, Acumedia #7510)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6matt","text":"Control strain, Salmonella typhimurium BIOBALL® Luminate (BioMerieux, #422190)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: This protocol was used to examine 4 different sources of water inoculated with a low level of Salmonella Typhimurium (ca 0.030 CFU/mL).

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dfpgf","text":"Take 1 of the water sample bottles (containing   of surface water) and carefully transfer water into a sterile 2 L Pyrex bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7t05j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"7AFDD900CBAD11ECB2DFD1C1F7351947","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jv9c","text":"If needed, add control strain to water sample by gently tipping vial over the opening. Close bottle tightly and thoroughly mix sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9fgov","text":"Aseptically measure   of 5X UPB and pour into 2 L bottle (making final concentration of 1X UPB)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6cslb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"8B70F7E0CBAD11ECB2DFD1C1F7351947","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c7247","text":"Secure lid and mix thoroughly before incubating at   for 18-24 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9q1vv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"44eqn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41qff","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"966FC1D0CBAD11ECB2DFD1C1F7351947","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bdplf","text":"For next steps, refer to “Selective Enrichment Protocol for Salmonella Isolation from Surface Water.”","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
